title: Updated System Actors
content:
graph TD
    subgraph System
        A[" "]
    end

    User["ðŸ‘¤ User"]
    Agents["ðŸ¤– Agents"]

    User --> System
    Agents --> System

    SystemNote["A fixed application with rule-based, if-then style logic."]
    UserNote["A person defined by their specialty (e.g., finance, legal)."]
    AgentsNote["AI entities specialized in a single topic, powered by LLMs like Gemini, OpenAI, or Grok."]

    A -.-> SystemNote
    User -.-> UserNote
    Agents -.-> AgentsNote

    style A fill:none,stroke:none
    style SystemNote fill:#f9f9f9,stroke:#333
    style UserNote fill:#e1f5fe,stroke:#333
    style AgentsNote fill:#e8f5e9,stroke:#333
